title: Breaking Update
description: Data concerning a successfully reproduced breaking dependency update

url.description: The URL of the GitHub pull request introducing the breaking update

project.description: The name of the repository containing the breaking update

breakingCommit.description: The commit hash of the commit introducing the breaking update

prAuthor.description: The type of user that introduced the breaking update PR

preCommitAuthor.description: The type of user that introduced the previous commit of the breaking update

breakingCommitAuthor.description: The type of user that introduced the breaking update commit

preCommitReproductionCommand.description: The command to build the project without the breaking update commit

breakingUpdateReproductionCommand.description: The command to build the project with the breaking update commit

javaVersionUsedForReproduction.description: The Java version used for the reproduction attempt

failureCategory.description: The category of the root cause of the reproduction failure
